description:
Hello everyone. Shinohara here.
Today is the day I finally take up Komatsu-san on his offer to teach
me glass blowing.
I`m a little nervous about it since I`ve never done this before, but
I`ll give it my all!
Muco-chan, be sure to cheer for me, too.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ムーコのぐるぐるが止まらない!
